sect1.title: Installing Make-&make-version;
sect1.para: The Make package contains a program for compiling large packages.
For its installation Make depends on: Bash, Binutils, Coreutils, Diffutils, GCC, Gettext, Glibc, Grep, Sed.

sect2.title: Installation of Make
sect2.para: To have the results tested, issue: make check.

sect2.title: Short description
sect2.para: make automatically determines which pieces of a large package need to be recompiled, and then issues the relevant commands.
